description: Access the Metropolitan Museum of Art's collection through natural language queries. Search for artworks, retrieve detailed information, and explore various departments effortlessly. Enhance your AI's capabilities with rich art resources and data.

capabilities.name: list-departments
capabilities.description: List all departments in the Metropolitan Museum of Art (Met Museum)

capabilities.name: search-museum-objects
capabilities.description: Search for objects in the Metropolitan Museum of Art (Met Museum). Will return Total objects found, followed by a list of Object Ids.The parameter title should be set to true if you want to search for objects by title.The parameter hasImages is false by default, but can be set to true to return objects without images.If the parameter hasImages is true, the parameter title should be false.

capabilities.name: get-museum-object
capabilities.description: Get a museum object by its ID, from the Metropolitan Museum of Art Collection
